data.description: Interface to IBM WebSphere Payment Manager
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WebSphere::Payment is an interface to the WebSphere Commerce
    Payments (former Payment Manager) part of the WebSphere suite of
    IBM. So that suggest the namespace. WebSphere is the root level
    because it's a suite of products and finally Payment is the product
    itself.

    Actually there is no such a public perl interface to this software.
